task.summary: Fix Rust build error E0599 in src/scene/mod.rs by restoring the numpy trait import that provides .shape().
task.problem: cargo/maturin build fails with: error[E0599]: no method named `shape` found for struct `PyReadonlyArray<'_, f32, Dim<[usize; 2]>>` Root cause: the trait providing `.shape()` (numpy::PyUntypedArrayMethods) was removed from src/scene/mod.rs imports.

acceptance_criteria.item: cargo build --release (and maturin build) succeeds on all targets
No new warnings about unused imports in src/scene/mod.rs

task.notes: Adding the trait import is required for calling `.shape()` on `PyReadonlyArray*` in numpy 0.21. The import is used (two calls to `arr.shape()` in `set_height_from_r32f`), so it will not trigger an unused import warning.
